short_description: At Stanford Court we don’t just like dogs, we love them. Our goal is to make all of our guests feel welcome and taken care of, especially our VIPs- Very Important Pets.
long_description:
At Stanford Court we don’t just like dogs, we love them. Our goal is to make all of our guests feel welcome and taken care of, especially our VIPs- Very Important Pets. Our Nob Hill hotel is a dog friendly hotel and with our new Happy Dog, Pet Friendly package, you’ll never want to leave.

 

Our Happy Dog @TSC includes:

 

Complimentary:

  •      Map Brochure
  •      Ball
  •      Tug Toy
  •      Lint Remover
  •      Souvenir Bag
  •      Poop Bags & Dispenser

 

Included items that can be borrowed or purchased:

  •      Dog Bed (large & small)     $25
  •      Food & Water Bowls           $25
  •      Spill Mat                            $25
  •      Leash                                $25

 

Cool things that can be borrowed:

  •      Pet Cube                        $300
  •      GoPro Dog Harness         $350
  •      iFetch Ball Roller             $100

So take your pal for a trip, we’d love to see you!
